code: import React from'react';import{usePokemonContext}from'../context/PokemonContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SearchBar(){const{state,dispatch}=usePokemonContext();const handleSearch=e=>{const searchTerm=e.target.value.toLowerCase();const filteredPokemons=state.pokemons.filter(pokemon=>pokemon.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm));dispatch({type:'FILTER_POKEMONS',payload:filteredPokemons});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"search-bar-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search Pokemon by name...",onChange:handleSearch,className:"search-input"})});}export default SearchBar;
